Literature.Title: Antibiotics. Targeting DnaN for tuberculosis therapy using novel griselimycins.
Literature.Author: Kling A, Lukat P, Almeida DV, Bauer A, Fontaine E, Sordello S, Zaburannyi N, Herrmann J, Wenzel SC, König C, Ammerman NC, Barrio MB, Borchers K, Bordon-Pallier F, Brönstrup M, Courtemanche G, Gerlitz M, Geslin M, Hammann PE, Heinz DW, Hoffmann H, Klieber S, Kohlmann M, Kurz M, Lair C, Matter H, Nuermberger E, Tyagi S, Fraisse L, Grosset JH, Lagrange S, Müller R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=1.2µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=5µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis Mt50.7(MIC=80µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii DSM 30008(MIC=>70µg/ml),Burkholderia cenocepacia DSM 16553(MIC=>70µg/ml),Chromobacterium violaceum DSM 30191(MIC=>70µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 1116(MIC=>70µg/ml),Escherichia coli deltatolC(MIC=>70µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 30104(MIC=>70µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>70µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 10(MIC=>70µg/ml),Corynebacterium glutamicum DSM 20300(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium DSM 20477(MIC=>70µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus DSM 1790(MIC=0.6µg/ml),Mycobacterium bovis BCG DSM 43990(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Nocardia asteroides DSM 43757(MIC=35.6µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=>70µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 11822(MIC=>70µg/ml),Staphylococcus carnosus DSM 20501(MIC=>70µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae DSM 20566(MIC=>70µg/ml),Streptomyces coelicolor A3(2)(MIC=7.0µg/ml),Streptomyces coelicolor pSET-PermE(MIC=7.0µg/ml),Streptomyces coelicolor pGri17(MIC=>55µg/ml),Candida albicans DSM 1665(MIC=>70µg/ml),Wickerhamomyces anomalus DSM 6766(MIC=>70µg/ml),Mucor hiemalis DSM 2656(MIC=>70µg/ml)
